General.Name: Ash-Sharqiyah Development Company
General.Description: Ash-Sharqiyah Development Co. engages in the agricultural business in Saudi Arabia. The company grows vegetables in greenhouses and outdoors. It also engages in production of mixed farming and hydroponics for vegetable production activities. In addition, the company is involved in operation of irrigation systems for agricultural projects, as well as installing of greenhouses; and supporting activities relating animal production. Further, it manages and leases real estate properties. Ash-Sharqiyah Development Co. was founded in 1986 and is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: 2592 King Khaled Street, Dammam, Saudi Arabia, 32244

2.Name: Engineer Abdul Aziz Mohammed Al Yaqoot
